short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lists all the caluclators & converters available on Allcalculator.tools along with a search functionality for faster access to users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allcalculator.Tools Extension is a handy and powerful tool that provides quick access to a wide range of online calculators and converters. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who needs reliable calculations at their fingertips!

1.Quick Access to Calculators and Converters:
Instantly access numerous calculators and converters without the need to search the web. Save time and boost your productivity with tools readily available in one click.

2.User-Friendly Interface:
The extension features a clean, intuitive interface with a search bar, making it easy to find the exact calculator you need. The user-friendly design ensures a seamless experience for users of all levels.

3.Wide Range of Calculators:
Whether you need a basic calculator, scientific calculator, financial calculator, or unit converter, this extension has you covered. From everyday calculations to complex conversions, find the tool you need in seconds.

4.Meta Title Display:
Each calculator or converter link displays its meta title, providing clear, concise information about its purpose. No more guessing â€“ quickly identify the right tool based on its title.

5.Enhance Your Productivity:
Ideal for students, teachers, engineers, financial analysts, and anyone who requires quick and accurate calculations. This extension streamlines your workflow, making calculations faster and easier.
Regular Updates:

The extension is regularly updated to include new calculators and converters, ensuring you always have the latest tools at your disposal.
